title: Personalized Science Instructional Design Process Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Middle School Science Foundational Knowledge and Self-Directed Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Personalized feedback based on learner activity data analysis in a smartphone-based LMS (Learning Management System), aimed at strengthening science competencies linked to corporate job roles.

learning_goals: Analyze learner interaction patterns (login frequency, content consumption time, etc.) with 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools
Design and implement at least three strategies to revise self-directed learning plans based on learning analytics results
Generate group participation metrics using LMS collaboration data (discussions, projects) and create a report linking them to team performance
Automate concept comprehension assessments by designing a real-time personalized quiz system based on learning analytics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
